LanguageData._canThrumboMilkBeCheese_title: Can Thrumbo milk be made into cheese?
LanguageData._canThrumboMilkBeCheese_desc: Can Thrumbo milk be made into cheese? (Requires Vanilla Cooking Extended)
LanguageData._canThrumbosGrowWool_desc: Can Thrumbos grow wool? Will allow Thrumbos to be shaved for their wool like other animals.
LanguageData._canAmbrosiaBeGrown_desc: Can ambrosia be grown? Unless set otherwise, ambrosia can only be grown in hydroponics after completing the research.
